channel.title: How to change theme easly in XP (Admin Lock It)
channel.description:
Change computer theme and layout
In this tut i will lean u how to download and install themes for ur XP computer and make your own themes :)
First of download "TopThemesXp" - Download here [url=http://www.topthinks.com/TopthemesXP]http://www.topthinks.com/TopthemesXP[/url] and remember to scan. Then go to [url=http://www.dowtheme.com]www.dowtheme.com[/url] and download a theme, then install your theme to a specificed folder the install program says. It should be at "My Documents" then run "TopThemesXP" click load theme, a box should come up then click "File for windows" or something like that, the properties window should come up whit the theme and click the theme and ok. There u are ;D
Making a theme Just run "TopThemesXP" and click "Make theme" and just follow the steps ;D ;D ;D ;D As easy is that ;D ;D
Post if u download or i will lock! :mad: Post errors to and il try to help
Good Luck!! [br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2007, 03:25:10 AM[/size][hr]62 reads and no reply!?
70 Reads and still nothing ill remove the whole thing!!

Change computer theme and layout

In this tut i will lean u how to download and install themes for ur XP computer
and make your own themes

First of download “TopThemesXp” - Download here http://www.topthinks.com/TopthemesXP and remember to scan.
Then go to www.dowtheme.com and download a theme,
then install your theme to a specificed folder the install program says.
It should be at “My Documents” then run “TopThemesXP”
click load theme, a box should come up then click “File for windows” or something
like that, the properties window should come up whit the theme and click the theme and ok.
There u are ;D

Making a theme
Just run “TopThemesXP” and click “Make theme” and just follow the steps ;D ;D
;D ;D As easy is that ;D ;D
